string.value: Learn about the strange things that have been happening in Leafre from #bChief Tatamo#k.
Go into #bThe Forest That Disappeared#k in Minar Forest and investigate the whereabouts of the Dragon Rider.
You discovered the identity of the Dragon Rider from #bMatada#k, the Halflinger Adventurer.

Like I said, we Halflingers have enjoyed years of peace thanks to our smart diplomacy with the Dragon face. But recently, we've discovered that some of our grain storages were destroyed and our livestock killed. We were horrified.
For our own safety, we formed security groups. That's when we discovered who was attacking our livestock. A dragon! The twist is that there was someone riding and controlling the dragon...

We call him the #bDragon Rider#k. We chased him, but lost him during a fierce battle in #b#eThe Forest That Disappeared#k#n. Many Halflingers were hurt, so we can't continue the investigation ourselves. #b#h0##k, would you assist us?
Thank you. The Dragon Rider was last seen in #bThe Forest That Disappeared#k. Please investigate there first.
The problem is bigger than it may seem. Please reconsider.
Is there something I can do for you?\r\n#L0##bI'm here in pursuit of the Dragon Rider.#l\n#k
The Dragon Rider... Ah. You must be here at the request of the Halflingers.\r\n#L0##bYes. Chief Tatamo in Leafre asked me to come.#l\n#k
I see. I'm investigating that myself. I'm also a Halflinger born in Leafre. I've been exploring the world and just happened to be returning home when I felt a strange energy within the Dragon race.

So. They call him the #bDragon Rider#k, eh? I observed some of his movements from here, though I couldn't quite make out his features. In any case, he headed with the Dragon toward the #b<Crimson Sky Doorway>#k.
Investigate where the Dragon Rider could have escaped to from #bThe Forest That Disappeared#k in Minar Forest. Perhaps someone saw him?
